title: Survey workload optimization
text: basic example shows query data GOA AI:
code: library(swo) yrs = 2017 species = c(10110, 21740) region = 'GOA' afsc_user = 'your_afsc_username' afsc_pwd = 'your_afsc_pwd'  query_data(region, species, yrs, afsc_user, afsc_pwd)  cpue <- vroom::vroom(here::here('data', 'cpue_goa.csv')) lfreq <- vroom::vroom(here::here('data', 'lfreq_goa.csv')) strata <- vroom::vroom(here::here('data', 'strata_goa.csv')) specimen <- vroom::vroom(here::here('data', 'specimen_goa.csv'))  swo_sim(iters = 2, lfreq, specimen, cpue, strata, yrs = 2017, boot_hauls = TRUE,     boot_lengths = TRUE, boot_ages = TRUE, length_samples = 100, sex_samples = 50,      write_comp = TRUE, save = 'test', region = 'goa')

title: query racebase — query_data
text: region specific region data ('GOA', 'AI') species species_codes e.g., c(10110, 21740) yrs minimum year consider (default: NULL) afsc_user afsc database username afsc_pwd afsc database password nbs switch include northern Bering Sea data (default: FALSE)

what: primary survey workload optimization function — swo
title: primary survey workload optimization function — swo
text: primary survey workload optimization function

title: primary survey workload optimization function — swo
code: swo(   lfreq_data,   specimen_data,   cpue_data,   strata_data,   yrs,   strata,   boot_hauls,   boot_lengths,   boot_ages,   reduce_lengths,   length_samples,   sex_samples )

title: primary survey workload optimization function — swo
text: lfreq_data length frequency data specimen_data age-length specimen data cpue_data abundance length data strata_data strata associated area yrs age filter returns years >= (default = NULL) strata switch analyzing strata (default = FALSE) - currently implemented boot_hauls switch resampling hauls (default = FALSE) boot_lengths switch resampling lengths (default = FALSE) boot_ages switch resampling ages (default = FALSE) reduce_lengths reduce total number lengths used analysis (default = NULL) length_samples change sample sizes (default = NULL) sex_samples change sample sizes (default = NULL)

title: primary survey workload optimization function — swo
code: swo(lfreq, specimen, cpue, strata_data, yrs = 2015, boot_hauls = TRUE,     boot_lengths = TRUE, length_samples = 100)

title: replicate swo function — swo_sim
text: replicate swo function

title: replicate swo function — swo_sim
code: swo_sim(   iters = 1,   lfreq_data,   specimen_data,   cpue_data,   strata_data,   yrs = NULL,   strata = FALSE,   boot_hauls = FALSE,   boot_lengths = FALSE,   boot_ages = FALSE,   reduce_lengths = NULL,   length_samples = NULL,   sex_samples = NULL,   save = NULL,   write_comp = FALSE,   write_sample = FALSE,   region = NULL,   save_orig = FALSE )

title: replicate swo function — swo_sim
text: iters number iterations (500 recommended) lfreq_data input dataframe specimen_data input dataframe cpue_data input dataframe strata_data input dataframe yrs year filter >= (default = NULL) strata switch regional strata (default = FALSE) boot_hauls resample hauls w/replacement (default = FALSE) boot_lengths resample lengths w/replacement (default = FALSE) boot_ages resample ages w/replacement (default = FALSE) reduce_lengths reduce total number lengths used analysis (default = NULL) length_samples sample size length (default = NULL) sex_samples sample size sex (default = NULL) save name save file write_comp save intermediate age/length comps write_sample save new "unsexed" default = FALSE region region create folder place results said folder save_orig save original
